messages.title: Nick Clegg has made four promises:
messages.content: FAIR taxes, FAIR start for all our children, FAIR economy protecting jobs by investing in a green future, FAIR, transparent and cleaner national and local politics

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Recovery will be difficult but public spending will be cut; public sector pay restraint; ending government contributions to Child Trust Fund; cutting tax credits for higher earners; axing defence contracts such as Eurofighter and Trident replacement; cutting back on Regional Development Agencies; slashing bureaucracy; kicking consulting habit; ending ID cards; protecting jobs with a levy on the profits of banks.
Equalising Capital Gains Tax with Income Tax; an increase in aviation taxes; a new mansion tax on properties worth over £2 million; replacing council tax with the fairer local income tax.

Offer the strongest set of policies on climate change, green technology, and new, green jobs; investing in people's lives by improving homes and building more social housing; investment in projects like railways and renewable energy; aviation taxes to curb a main source of climate changing gases.
Reducing class sizes and increasing one to one tuition; promising new investment in schools.
Cleaning up Party funding; not beholden to non-dom millionaires; pushing for a fairer proportional representation voting system.
Raising police numbers; reforming the prison system to reform offenders and not enrolling them in a college course on crime.

issues.economy: Recovery will be difficult but public spending will be cut; public sector pay restraint; ending government contributions to Child Trust Fund; cutting tax credits for higher earners; axing defence contracts such as Eurofighter and Trident replacement; cutting back on Regional Development Agencies; slashing bureaucracy; kicking the consulting habit; ending ID cards; protecting jobs with a levy on the profits of banks.
issues.education: Reducing class sizes and increasing one to one tuition; promising new investment in schools.
issues.environment: Offer the strongest set of policies on climate change, green technology, and new, green jobs; investing in people's lives by improving homes and building more social housing; investment in projects like railways and renewable energy; aviation taxes to curb a main source of climate changing gases.
issues.governance: Cleaning up Party funding; not beholden to non-dom millionaires; pushing for a fairer proportional representation voting system.

housing.content: Improving homes and building more social housing.

images.caption: Nick Clegg has made four promises: FAIR taxes, FAIR start for all our children, FAIR economy protecting jobs by investing in a green future, FAIR, transparent and cleaner national and local politics.
